---
title: "RL Fitting"
output: html_notebook
---

1.  Load libraries

```{r setup, include=T}
library(readr)
library(cmdstanr)
library(posterior)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message = F, warning = F)
```

2.  Read data block

```{r}
data <- read_rds('../data/processed/data.RDS')
```

3.  Load and fit combined model ($\alpha_{R+},\alpha_{R-},\alpha_{P+},\alpha_{P-},\beta_{R},\beta_{P}$)

```{r}
vso_model <- cmdstan_model(exe_file = '../stan/models/vso_model.exe')
fit_vso <- vso_model$sample(data = data, parallel_chains = 4,
                            iter_warmup = 2000, iter_sampling = 2000,
                            output_dir = '../stan/fits/',
                            seed = 123)

```
